title: Vidhi A. Sharma
text:
I’m Vidhi A. Sharma, a Master’s student in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University with a background in computer science and hands-on experience in analytics, operations, and business strategy. I enjoy streamlining processes, designing data solutions, and making sense of complex problems with a mix of logic, clarity, and curiosity.
From automating reports and building dashboards to analyzing trends and improving workflows, I bring both structure and energy to the table. I’m comfortable translating between technical teams and business stakeholders, and I take pride in making things work better and look easier than they are.







Proficient in SQL, Python, R, and data visualization tools. Experience with statistical analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling to extract actionable insights from complex datasets.
SQL Python R Tableau



Skilled in database design, ETL processes, and workflow optimization. Experience in streamlining business operations through data-driven approaches and process automation.
ETL Database Design Process Optimization



Knowledge of full-stack development principles with experience in creating data-driven applications and dashboards. Comfortable with version control systems and agile methodologies.
Web Development Git Agile
